snippet.title: Altered Alma - Official "Welcome to Sagrada Familia" Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Altered Alma is a cyberpunk Space Opera Metroidvania adventure with RPG and dating sim elements, set in the neon-lit streets of Neo-Barcelona. This latest trailer reveals a previously unseen area of the game, introducing new enemies, mini-bosses, and some visceral Jack fatalities. It also gives us a brief look at the game's dialogue system. Altered Alma is coming to PC via Steam.

#gamescom
